turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want any toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to have two supreme meat on them and then the other I would like ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 medium pizzas, 2 supreme meat and one hawaiian, any extras?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you mean extras?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Extra cheese, thin crust, thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like extra cheese. And I would like to try up this new pizzeria, Bella Luna, if you can.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order it from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total after adding extra cheese will be $48.48.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hell, yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've processed the order. it will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good meal.
